MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Jeran
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Grragh! Let's assault dah～! Jeran will show you how to hunt dah～!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Jeran
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...IT'S, C-COOOOLD!? What the, it's snowing all around the Train daah～!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Khajuraho
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's true. Because of the heating magic in train, I didn't feel too cold either. Aaangh, I'm getting goosebumps now...♪

Jeran jumped out without thinking, and we all followed her outside the train. Incidentally, this area is northern M. Nishiki and is always covered in snow, probably because of the extremely low number of celestial orbs.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah, that was also mentioned in documents, wasn't it? Goodness, really wished you all would take your missions more seriously lah!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: As an aside, chocolate is important in Valentine's Day, isn't it?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: And yet. The ingredient of chocolate, cacao, is a plant that is originally grown in tropics - the hot regions. So it is almost never found in these cold regions.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: And that's why. If Ours Truly can spread the culture of Valentine here and sell sweet and tasty chocolate, we can make a lot of money and- AIYAH!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Khajuraho
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Little Sento, you're talking too much♪ And no one is listening anyway～?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Please listen to me! Yours Truly is trying so hard to talk! I mean, please don't simply touch me, it's impolite lah!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Khajuraho
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Mhmh, it's cold, so I thought I'd warm you up with body contact...♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Jeran
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Get it now! Sentosa looks warm because she's fluffy～, Jeran is warm too～! Cuddle～☆.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Graawh～!? So please don't stick so closely to me, it's hard for me to move! Yours Truly can't deal with the rampaging monsters while being this tied up!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahikawa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Not going to matter. The demon-like creatures don't seem to be interested in us.
Asahikawa grumbled while aiming her gun, her weapon at them, while hugging my back for some reason. Where she pointed - were countless beast-like creatures are rampaging about in snowfields.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Monster
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 'Ugrrru! Ugrrru!'

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Monster
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 'Ugruuuuu!'

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahikawa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmm～? What are they really, wolves? But they look human-like too, don't they?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Khajuraho
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: They look like werewolves.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's a possibility, that they could be residents of the small nation where we planned to spread Valentine's Day.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Khajuraho
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Aaah, I recalled you mentioned something like that.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Khajuraho
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: However, aren't those monsters running amok over there? Do you think it's okay to deal with monsters, as far as the SSS is concerned?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmmmm, that's the difficult part. Werewolves - that we call them, but the inhabitants of the small state in question are so-called demihumans.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Khajuraho
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Demihumans... I think it's a generic term for humanoid monsters, like goblins or gillmen, which are very famous.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes. And although demihumans are usually considered to be monsters that are enemies of humanity, some of them have intelligence and culture comparable to ours.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It is sometimes possible to do business with such intelligent and rational demihumans.
Yes. And if you can interact with them through trade and build a friendship with them, you don't have to fight those demihumans by force.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Khajuraho
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Fighting until one side goes extinct is needless bloodshed. If we can get along, that's the best.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Jeran
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Understand now - it's more peaceful that way dah! It's like the SSS dah!
Of course, it is impossible to reconcile with Mist Monsters - demons that has been invaded by Phantom Mist. With other monsters though, there is room for negotiation.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I mean. The purpose of Your Truly's team mission is to create that kind of 'room for negotiation'. Not to solve via war, but diplomacy, so to speak.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That can be said as a strategy too. If we just charge in and crush each other without thinking, what is the point of our intelligence then?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahikawa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But that sounds like a lot of work.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Jeran
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Mhm, mhm! It's easier to hunt all enemies dah～♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: N-No, that's too savage! Now I don't know which one us are demons lah, gosh!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Khajuraho
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmhmm. Actually, as little Ranran said, I think it would be quicker to just kill them all without thinking.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Khajuraho
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Where there's a will, there's a way. Keep expanding and never give up, and eventually even a clenched fist will fit in hole.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: For a second I thought you were being serious, but you were saying depraved nonsense again!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Khajuraho
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Eeeeh? How can that be a sex joke? I don't think I uttered a single sexual word. Hey, hey, do tell me which part of what I said was naughty?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: P-Please don't rub my breasts while engaging in strange rebuttals! Real hamsap...!
It's fine that you're all friendly, but don't be too relaxed.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahikawa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah. It seems like the werewolves noticed us because we were making too much noise.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Werewolf
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 'Ugrrru! Rrrru!'

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahikawa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What should we do? Shoot them? They only have primitive spears and swords, we can still slaughter them unilaterally for now you know?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Sentosa
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Graawh～? We're not even engaged yet, surely it's not reasonable to make a preemptive attack? We are here for diplomacy, so to speak--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Khajuraho
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ahaha. If we kill even one of them, we'll be in full-blown hostilities and we won't be able to sell chocolate.
'You all!'
Suddenly, one of the werewolves rushed towards us, speaking in human language.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Werewolf
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 'If I'm not mistaken, are you the Special Steel Squad?'

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Jeran
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Whoa? That monster spoke dah～!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Khajuraho
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Contrary to the impression it gives on the outside, it seems to have a certain amount of intelligence. Well, it can't do diplomacy otherwise, can it?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Werewolf
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 'Oh, what luck! I have heard of your fame!'

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Werewolf
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 'Hail the messengers of great peace, members of the Special Steel Squad! I know we've never met before and apologies for my rudeness, but I have a favour to ask of you all...!'
